content.detailedDescription:
been videoing the monterey bay area for years i have videoed over 20 ufos
and about the same in photos up to this day. videos are filmed at night..
this video that i'm reporting has not only the typical white colors as orbs
but there is this blue orb that comes up under a small airplane then moves away about 20 or so feet stops then takes off supper fast. it's a must see
video!...At this time i'm not going to show them there under review.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Videoing at the marina beach filed what i thought was a airplane but it was three ufos

content.detailedDescription:
On june 16, 2012, at 9:45 pm, over the horizon,(while sitting on a balcony at the jersey shore) i observed in the sky coming from the north, what i thought was a plane at first, but soon realized that what i saw could not be that. the object quickly changed directions, and moved faster, i knew that it could not be a plane. i observed the object follow this pattern going to the northeast near the big dipper constellation. i watched it approx for 55 seconds, and it was long enough for me, to observe the object in the sky. i know my eyes were not playing tricks on me as i stared at this thing move out into space and get smaller and smaller. shame i did not have a good video camera with a super zoom lens. someone over ny, north jersey, or even northeast pa should have encountered this light. from my advantage or view - i would say it was close to philadelphia airport or newark airport. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light with steady movement into the stars

content.detailedDescription: I was always outside as a boy enjoying the end of the summer day being on my porch watching the sun go down.  this evening, my attention was drawn to my left point of view by either movement or sound or light.  the object seemed to slowly hover directly over my street while moving from an east to west direction, as my house faced south it was easy to see.  i do not know if anyone else was outside as i'd never bothered to speak nor ask about it.  it is strange now that i write this that i never spoke of it to my parents as a boy.  only telling them as a grown man during camping campfire conversations.  it was pill-shaped (round) but convex in design.  dark greenish black colored with lights on the hull of many different colors reminding me of the old r-9 christmas lights, but yellow, white, red, blue and maybe green glow.  the lights were stationary, but the craft/hull itself spun slowly in a counter-clockwise direction while moving from my left to right.  it was positioned just above the level of the powerlines and hummed/reverberated while in front of me.  i'm pretty sure it didn't know i was so close to it.  i stood up not realizing i'd done so, and instinctively ran to get my orange schwinn bicycle to follow it.  it flew west and i began pedaling after when it began to pick up in speed.  i had to cross a unkempt field down a dirt path to continue westward and was trying to pedal faster when i saw it increasing speed and upward angle.  when i reached the other side of the field i lost the craft behind a line of taller trees and when i got clear of them to the west, the craft had to have sped out of sight.  there were no other obstructions to block my view so i knew it had to have continued on its upward path and exponentially increased speed.  i kept riding out in to the desert-like area of town where there were really no obstructions at all is it was a desert town and never found a landing site.  my assumption is that it disappeared into the night-sky.  but i will never forget the event and can still hear and see that evening with perfect clarity even though i am now in my early forties.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: One of those images burned forever into my mind's eye.

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i were climbing lookout man up a power line.  we stopped to rest, laid down on a rock and noticed the object.  we observed for at least an hour and it never moved.  thats why i don't think it was a weather balloon.  it was still there when we resumed our climb.
content.summary: Silver ball in sky did not move for 1hour

content.detailedDescription: Second event was pulsating light a few days later. was above ball field about 400 ft. from my house.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed what looked like a star darting around then disappeared into horizon. was above my house. a few nights later son asked me to look at something and saw light through the trees pulsating different colors above. ballfield by my house about 400 ft.

content.detailedDescription: 24/06/2012  over twinfalls  idaho usa,  first  time  i"m see  and take photo  one  they  go  down  from  bright  light  and one  go  right  from light  with too  fast  speed   and  they  stay   in sky like  two   min  and they  just turn  off light  im  take  photo  and on the photo  red  orange , green , white, lightnow im belive in  extrateresstrial life and   they  come here  in  peace   to help us  100%%  sure they run like   to  fast speed   when im   start  taking photo like they afraid  of  us  on earth !!  this is true  belive   me   just true  !!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3   eggs   they go   down with  too  fast  speed

content.detailedDescription:
long description of sighting report**video shows evp of alien speech as i enter room**we did not hear this in real time until we played our voice recorder back.Opens with itunes.
about a month ago my 10 year old son and his brother woke me up by screaming for me to come to there bedroom,i checked on them and they told me they saw a bright blue light blind them inside the room,and when they got up and looked out the window they saw a small disk type object flying away from our home,my son said it was about the size of a yard stick. i told them at the time they must have seen an emergency vehicle going down the street and insisted that they just go to bed. on the 9th of this month we were all up late hanging out,my wife and i heard a noise coming from that bedroom,thinking it might be a ghost,because we live in a 102 yr old funeral home,we grab our ipod touches and digital voice recorder and open the door,not turning the light on. we enter the room and stay to the right wall of the room and stay standing in one position with my video recording in front of my face. we are talking out loud thinking that we may have a ghost in the home,and after a few minutes we leave the room. upon reviewing the recording that night we first hear as i enter the room my self what i can only describe as frogs croaking,mixed with an insect clicking language speech sound. it is loud but we did not hear it with our ears at the time. the video shows some sort of being what we first thought was a ghost of a kid or midget. we then see what appears to be a disk enter the room and hover above the white being and it zips left and right and then down on top of the main figure. we also notice at this time there seems to be a cloud or white energy ring being formed around the being,it seems to us that there are other beings in the room behind this one that has large almond eyes,typical larger head with small chin. then we notice when we frame by frame the video the disk zips up and left of me at an angle and this time we see it as a bright led neon plasma blue color as the beings are "sucked into it or are just leaving with it"? we still dont know for sure what we see but we for sure have this speech recorded and it is loud and very clear. we have no clue as to if we are really seeing this or not,were hoping its just our imagination because this is very frighting and too close to home we know the video on the ipod isnt perfect but we thought we were just going to document toys being moved by what we thought may have been a spirit in our sons room. the speech is what really has me convinced it is alien in nature i would gladly post the audio of this to anyone that wants to hear it. we are weeks away from having a baby and dont know if they are here for that reason or that they were doing something that has nothing to do with us at all,but my sons story a month prior now seems more believable to us all now,were all 6 sleeping in one bedroom together now and are moving out as soon as we can.
content.summary: Updated with photos from original event

content.detailedDescription: I take pictures of the sky a lot. i've never actually seen what ever it is that shows up in the pics. i do find strange things all of the the time in my photos.
content.summary: I notice it in the photo

content.detailedDescription:
We were at les schwab tires getting a blown out tire replaced, we were done and went out back to hook up the travel trailer when we saw the lights.

fast bright streaking lights to south caught our attention.

didn't know what it was, we stopped and watched them, i ran back up front and caught the tire guy before he went home, he didn't know what is was.

they looked like bright lights, small in size, they moved very fast like a blur, they appeared to be chasing each other 2 of them at time most of the time, 3rd would just come in and out randomly, sometimes more of them 2 or 3 more could be seen out to the sides in the distance.
several time 2 of them were travel in a parallel direction and the 3rd would speed in from the other direction and pass between them.

excited, very excited, it something i have never seen before, couldn't explain what it was but i liked it, we tried to get video on a cell phone but battery was too low and would not record.

we watched this for about 15 to 20 minutes or more, we finally had to leave to keep on schedule for home work time, on our way to the interstate we drove past what we thought was area they were in, i forgot to look but the other passenger looked and saw nothing.

i am very serious about talking to someone from mufon, if there were other people who saw this i am interested, i would like to hear an opinion from the experts to verify if they think this was a non terrestrial sighting.
content.summary: 2 to 3 objects appeared to be chasing each other, occasionally a 4 to 6th would appear out to the sides in the distance.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were sitting on the beach around 11:00 pm pdt  at first beeach near lapush, washington.  we were facing the western sky.  to the south along the shore there appeared an orange dot the size of an aspirin flying at the altitude that an airliner would fly.  it flew faster than a plane.  then from the north two more orange dots flew southward -- again flying faster than a plane.  then a fourth orange dot came from the south along the shore.  the four dots appeared to meet  directly to the west of the beach, and then fly westward over the pacific.  they disappeared before flying far enogh to be out of sight.  all four were the size of an aspirin, orange, and too large and fast to be airplanes
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Four orange lights over lapush, washington

content.detailedDescription: Not enough time
content.summary: Observed a satellite friend began to video with i phone when he tape the event

content.detailedDescription: Was searching the sky with night vision and came accross two ufos meandering through the sky. 2am june 24, 2012.
content.summary: 2 ufo's travelling together

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were outside watching the kids when i started to notice strange objects flying around... i have seen these before for as long as i can remember... but this night was different. the sun was down and we were going inside when i saw a moving light moving north west over mingus mountain. i pointed it out to my wife and as soon as we were both watching it rapidly started to grow bigger and closer. it got close enough to know it was not a plane but could tell it was a craft.. the object grew in intensity on approach and stopped and hovered for a few seconds then surged with light and rapidly went back the way it came in..... after that i went and got my camera on a tripod and took picks of anything strange... the pics that acdrrriptually caught something were astonishing to say the least....
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Cone,   Cylinder,   Fireball,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Small light in distance rapidly approached... looked like a burning fireball. fast as it came it left. sighting lasted aprox 30secs

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house talking on the phone but i heard a rumbling noise and i see that it is not blinking like all planes and helicopter do. so i taught it might be some type of government plane or stuff like that. but this object disappear after i looked at it for a few seconds. it started dimming the white light to red and than i heard no sound at all after either...There was no way it was plane or known object. i could of recognized it right away. this is the second time i see the same thing..But going different directions. and this time as i was sitting down i felt like my ear could hear everything. it was a weird feeling. what are they spreading???
content.summary: Flying object sounded like a helicopter, white light than turn red and disappear. second time seeing this exact thing in this area.

content.detailedDescription: Was on vacation in mexico city for the day of independence walking around in the main square in front of the capitol building. taking pictures of everything. long story short, i didnt notice anything or hear or see anything flying around when i took the pic, but when i got back home to california and went through all of my pictures, i had noticed something in the sky in one of them. til this day i have no idea what it is and no one else does either, but i need to know what it could be.Im obsessed with this pic because i have seen a ufo before that and this time i feel i have proof by dumb luck!! im attaching the original pic and one that is zoomed in more. thanks for taking the time to check it out. please let me know what you think!!
content.summary: Picture taken of ufo but didnt notice until later

content.detailedDescription: i was driving down hwy 70 west bound. thought i saw a star move. pulled over opened sunroof. saw three lights appear to converge in a spiral pattern then become brighter. light slowly faded. not sure what it was but it was freakin' cool. i did see another vehicwele pulled over but couldnt tell if they were also watching.
content.summary: Saw three lights that thought were stars move in inward spiral then became brighter

content.detailedDescription:
1.Me and my friend were up on the hill behind my house. we were just sitting up there talking.
2. the plane the was going east it shot up out of the trees.
3. i knew it was a ufo right when i saw it.
4. the object was larger than a subaru car, it was pulsating red, whit and green lights. it was moving back and forth it did this like five times and then just disappeared.
5. when i saw it at first i was like cool, awesome. my feelings were excited and really happy. after the sighting i was really scared because we were hearing noises right behind us and we saw it again passing over the place where we were on the hill behind my house.
6. i lost sight of it because it just disappeared in to thin air both times we saw it.
content.summary: It was very bright red green and white and larger than even a car

content.detailedDescription:
Day one june 26, 2012 friends and family at home on farm farm back patio in mount airy by virginia border. young child noticed bright star before dark at 8:45 pm.. star got brighter then popped bright to dim then split into 2 first stayed stationary, second looted downward. then both disappeared after 30-45 seconds.

day 2 june 27, 2012 family same time same description only star appeared to move from 60 degrees north overtop of family slowly. called friend across town to validate seeing what i see, he did and was approximately 10 miles away as the crow flies. starlike object stopped then simulated the same as night before by bright popping and turning into 2. objects appears to change direction then disappeared being replaced by 2red lights immediatelynin a cross fashion with white light steady on flying to east towards winston-salem nc.

day 3 june 28,2012 tonight. drove to winston-salem to purchase high power spotting scope.Made purchase then stepped put of store into parking lot at 8:45-8:50 and wife and kids all were looking at 2 objects again overhead of winston-salem nc. commercial aircraft flew over at roughly same elevation a minute or so after and could be seen clearly but other 2objects looked like night before with 2 red lights on again and no noise at all. commercial aircraft was heard with np. 

common pattern here is 8:45 or so before darkness falls. tried recording video on day 2 when in sight but recording just was black with gargles buzz shot another video of two red lights in cross formation for only couple seconds as it flew overhead.

now have digital camera ipod and spotting scope ready for night 4 if we are lucky we can catch it again and maybe shoot some fireworks up at it. maybe just star wars project from dod.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Have seen this 3 days in a row at 8:45pm to 8:55pm

content.detailedDescription:
I was making a fire for about 3 hours in the woods near the road around the back of disneyworld, it was damp and a problem. when it finally was roaring i noticed a blue light with a blue ring of light or reflection around it through tree openings above me
it seemed different from any air craft ive seen at night, it vanish behind the tree after i watched it go by for about 20 seconds. and i thought about ufos and felt almost as if i were being watched so i high tailed it out of there and ending up going closer to disney to watch fireworks. as the show went on i noticed the blue light again in the distance, near the fireworks! (funny as this was the direction it seemed to be heading earlier)
it floated motionless and looked somewhat like the top of a tower, but a plane came near it and the blue light vanished, i did not see it again.
content.summary: Witnessed a blue light and followed it a ways down the road

content.detailedDescription: The dog was barking more than usual and i was having trouble sleeping.  i saw a thin grey looking alien shape shadow walking down the road behind a skunk.  watch for about 30 to 35 secs then it just disappeared.  watched for another 30 minutes and nothing.  i have never seen anything like this before and was a little startled by saying i even saw this, but i know it was about 3-4 feet tall and thin, just following a skunk.
content.summary: I saw a grey looking shadowy figure with dark eyes walking down the street with a skunk.  never seen anythink like this before

content.detailedDescription: I saw two white orbs small in size because they were so high in the sky. they seemed to follow each other precisely but the second one appeared to slow but followed in the same path. it was flying much higher than a normal plane would. they were going north and the first one seemed to really pick up speed as we observed it as the second one slowed but continued to follow, they were out of our view within 3 to 5 minutes.
content.summary: 2 white orb shapes going north

content.detailedDescription: I was not able to use the form above to even begin to explain what i would like to.  i am a retired geologist and when i was ten or eleven years old i had an experience in another state on one of the farms my family owned.  while i was at the farm with my father i wandered out into the pasture about 1/4 mile to a small pond.  on my way back, probably 200 yards below the dam there was suddenly, to my left about 20' away, a sort of rectangular area that was irregular but definitely did appear to have depth.  it was approximately 5x8 feet and very brillant shimmering white. it appeared to have straight sided panes or euhedral crystal faces. i only saw it for what i believe to be a few seconds and then i was sitting on the sloping bank where the light had been and i know now as i knew then that it simply was "later".  i have absolutely no idea how much time had passed.  i was also aware of a itch on my left leg.  about half way between my knee and ankle there was a deep pit about 3/8" in diameter that just had a very light abraded area on it, not really a scab.  that night my mother saw it and asked what happened and i simply had to tell her i didn't know.  this pit is still there.   there has never been any doubt in my mind about what happened and it has always been present but not in any way dominate or intrusive.  another thing which ocurred, a comparable mark appeared in proximity to the first in the last few years and i have abolutely no idea how or exactly when this happened.  my memory is and always has been phenominal.  i have never said anything about this to anybody at anytime.  i would like to be able to describe, in more detail, all of this to someone and have the use of a whiteboard to go into more detail.  i've spent most of my professional career teaching and training my peers on university and professional levels and can do a far better job than i have here.
content.summary: 5x8' rectangular panel bright white shimmering irregular panes or euhedral crystal faces and then it was "later" and i had a pit on my leg,

content.detailedDescription: Driving westbound on 441 towards penfield from walworth i noticed what i thought was the red height warning light on a radio tower. once i remembered there was no radio tower in the area, i slowed down and woke my wife in the passenger seat. i observed the light moving and pulled over to the side of the road to get photos. my video was full and i took a few photos. my wife observed that the lights all around the object were cylindrical and faced multiple directions. the object was traveling a easterly direction about the speed of a helicopter but without any sound or the usual blinking tail lights. it went out of view in about 2-3 minutes. the photos taken show multiple colors and appear more rounded than our observed triangular shape. they resemble something similar to the back view of the engines from the millenium falcon from star wars. excited to have viewed and photographed a sighting.
content.summary: Driving westbound 441, observed bright glowing redish object appearing triangular. when photographed from cell, shows rounded.

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving down our street after coming home from having an ice cream.
2. bright blue light and like a leaf or feather floating to the ground. 
3. something coming down from space. 
4. bright dark blue light changing to a lighter color as it went from left to right and up and down. stopping at times and then shooting off with the light being bright blue to a bright white as it moved around fading at times.. disappeared quickly and returned with a white blue light changing to a brighter blue.  
5. relaxed thought maybe someone was flying something. after watching it for awhile no one could have been flying this with a remote. didn't get it much thought to being a ufo, until i started reading on ufo's.
6. went dark and never saw it again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright blue light, up and down dim to black, left to right up and down.

content.detailedDescription:
On may 16, 2012, i witnessed a black triangle craft pass over head.

i noticed the object when i was walking back from my car.

i thought it might be a plane until i realized it made no sound and didn't seem to have a viewable form.

the craft few overhead like a plane would. you could not see the actual outline of the craft since it blended into the night sky until i looked really close and could see a v. i only noticed the craft due to the main light coming from the front of the craft. there seemed to be no other lights coming from the craft.

i was a little freaked out since it made no sound. i just kept looking as it passed over head.

the craft disappeared from view after about one minute.
content.summary: Black triangle craft

content.detailedDescription: I was up late studying for school and walked outside to fill the cats water bowl before bed. i looked out into the distance and saw this cylinder like shaped object hovering in the sky. at first i thought it was a planet  because of the size being larger than a typical star. however, after further observation i noticed the object began to sway back and forth then stopped and periodically ascended and descended in a fast motion. i have never seen any plane or helicopter move the way this object had. wondering if any one else saw the same thing. i didn't stay up for more than 1 to 1 1/2 hours after initial sighting to see it disappear. i had continuous sight of the object up until the point when i went to bed around 4:30 or 5:00am. i tried to record the sighting on my phone and it would not pick up on the camera.
content.summary: Shaped like a cylinder emitted blue red white lights with red ring aura hovered with periodic ascending and descending
